user.title: LLM Vision Setup
user.description: Select the provider you want to set up.

localai.title: Connect to your LocalAI server
localai.description: Provide the IP address and port of your LocalAI server.

data_description.default_model: The default model to use when no other model is specified.
data_description.temperature: Controls the randomness of the output. Lower values make the output more deterministic.
data_description.top_p: Controls the diversity of the output. Lower values make the output more focused.

ollama.title: Configure Ollama
ollama.description: Provide the IP address and port of your Ollama server.

data_description.default_model: The default model to use when no other model is specified.
data_description.temperature: Controls the randomness of the output. Lower values make the output more deterministic.
data_description.top_p: Controls the diversity of the output. Lower values make the output more focused.

data_description.context_window: Sets the size of the context window used to generate the next token.
data_description.keep_alive: Controls how long the model will stay loaded into memory following the request. Default: 5m (5 minutes), -1: keep in memory indefinitely, 0: unload immediately

openai.title: Configure OpenAI
openai.description: Provide a valid OpenAI API key.

data_description.api_key: Make sure to add credit to your OpenAI account.

data_description.default_model: The default model to use when no other model is specified.
data_description.temperature: Controls the randomness of the output. Lower values make the output more deterministic.
data_description.top_p: Controls the diversity of the output. Lower values make the output more focused.

azure.title: Configure Azure
azure.description:
Provide a valid Azure API key, base URL, deployment and API version.
The Base URL must be in the format `https://domain.openai.azure.com/` including the trailing slash.

data_description.default_model: The default model to use when no other model is specified.
data_description.temperature: Controls the randomness of the output. Lower values make the output more deterministic.
data_description.top_p: Controls the diversity of the output. Lower values make the output more focused.

anthropic.title: Configure Anthropic Claude
anthropic.description: Provide a valid Anthropic API key.

data_description.api_key: Make sure to add credit to your Anthropic account.

data_description.default_model: The default model to use when no other model is specified.
data_description.temperature: Controls the randomness of the output. Lower values make the output more deterministic.
data_description.top_p: Controls the diversity of the output. Lower values make the output more focused.

google.title: Configure Google Gemini
google.description: Provide a valid Google Gemini API key.

data_description.default_model: The default model to use when no other model is specified.
data_description.temperature: Controls the randomness of the output. Lower values make the output more deterministic.
data_description.top_p: Controls the diversity of the output. Lower values make the output more focused.

groq.title: Configure Groq
groq.description: Provide a valid Groq API key.

data_description.default_model: The default model to use when no other model is specified.
data_description.temperature: Controls the randomness of the output. Lower values make the output more deterministic.
data_description.top_p: Controls the diversity of the output. Lower values make the output more focused.

custom_openai.title: Configure Custom OpenAI provider
custom_openai.description: **Important**: Only works if the API is compatible with OpenAI's API. If the API doesn't require an API key, enter a dummy value. The endpoint must have the following format: `http(s)://baseURL(:port)/some/endpoint`

data_description.endpoint: The API enpoint following this format: http(s)://baseURL(:port)/some/endpoint
data_description.api_key: API key or 'openai', if none is required.

data_description.default_model: The default model to use when no other model is specified.
data_description.temperature: Controls the randomness of the output. Lower values make the output more deterministic.
data_description.top_p: Controls the diversity of the output. Lower values make the output more focused.

aws_bedrock.title: Configure AWS Bedrock provider
aws_bedrock.description: **Important**: This currently only supports the following models: Nova, Anthropic Claude

data_description.default_model: The default model to use when no other model is specified.
data_description.temperature: Controls the randomness of the output. Lower values make the output more deterministic.
data_description.top_p: Controls the diversity of the output. Lower values make the output more focused.

openwebui.title: Configure Open WebUI provider
openwebui.description: Provide API key (JWT token), IP Address, Port, HTTP(S) and default model.

data_description.https: Use HTTPS for secure connections if your server supports it.

data_description.default_model: The default model to use when no other model is specified.
data_description.temperature: Controls the randomness of the output. Lower values make the output more deterministic.
data_description.top_p: Controls the diversity of the output. Lower values make the output more focused.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure the LLM Vision integration. This entry is required before setting up other providers. If you wish to use the default settings, just press 'Submit'.

general_section.name: General
general_section.description: Set preferred provider to use when the selected provider is unavailable.

data_description.fallback_provider: LLM Vision will retry the request with the selected provider if the current provider fails.

prompt_section.name: System Prompts
prompt_section.description: System prompts are used to change how the model behaves and responds.

data_description.system_prompt: Use the system prompt to change how the model behaves and responds.
data_description.title_prompt: The instruction given to the model to generate a title.

timeline_section.name: Timeline
timeline_section.description: Timeline stores today's events to display using LLM Vision Card on your dashboard.

data_description.retention_time: Auto delete events after (days). Set to 0 to disable auto deletion.
data_description.timeline_today_summary: Enable timeline summary to automatically generate a summary of today's events.
data_description.timeline_summary_prompt: The instruction given to the model to generate a summary of today's events.

memory_section.name: Memory (Beta)
memory_section.description: Content in memory syncs across providers and is used to provide additional context to the model.

data_description.memory_paths: Provide the path to the image file.
data_description.memory_strings: Provide a description of the image (e.g.: 'This is Cookie, my dog'). Images and descriptions must be in the same order, and there must be as many descriptions as images.

error.handshake_failed: Could not connect to the server. Check you API key or IP and port
error.memory_not_supported: This provider does not support memory
error.invalid_image_path: One or more image paths are invalid
error.mismatched_lengths: The number of image paths and descriptions must match
